price: Akasema: Mola wangu Mlezi! Ilivyo kuwa umenitia makosani, basi nahakikisha nitawazaini hapa duniani na nitawapoteza wote,
arabic: قَالَ رَبِّ بِمَآ أَغۡوَيۡتَنِي لَأُزَيِّنَنَّ لَهُمۡ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَلَأُغۡوِيَنَّهُمۡ أَجۡمَعِينَ
footnotes: Akasema Iblisi, mkhalifu, a'asi: Ewe Muumba wangu unaye nibakisha! Umenitakia upotofu, nami nikatumbukia ndani yake. Basi kwa sababu hiyo nahakikisha kuwa nitawapambia wanaadamu maovu wayaone mazuri, na nitafanya kila juhudi kuwapotoa wote!

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: qāla rabbi bimā aghwaytanī la-uzayyinanna lahum fī al-arḍi wala-ugh'wiyannahum ajmaʿīna
